snippet: Sales in the United States and Canada fell about 5 percent in 2014, but in China they rose 34 percent.
abstract: Motion Picture Assn of America releases results of annual statistical survey, showing that world movie box office was up 1 percent in 2014 from 2013, but that tickets sales in United States and Canada fell around 5 percent; highest growth in tickets sales was in China.
lead_paragraph: Sales in the United States and Canada fell about 5 percent in 2014, but in China they rose 34 percent.

headline.main: Global Movie Ticket Sales Rise 1% as China Surges
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Movie Ticket Sales Rise, Fueled by Growth in China
